"Main_Content":
"新聞來源：USA Today
https://goo.gl/7737Sp


以下節錄重點：

LaVar Ball harshly criticized the Los Angeles Lakers' coaching efforts by
calling the staff "soft" and saying coaches are "babying" his son
"Time":
rookie
point guard Lonzo Ball.

球爸強烈地批評了湖人隊教練團的指導方針，他稱教練團太「軟」，並說教練們都把
他兒子「當嬰兒對待」

"They're soft. They don't know how to coach my son. I know how to coach him
"Max_Word_Indicator":
LaVar Ball told Bleacher Report in a story published Tuesday. I tell (Lonzo)
to go get the victory. Stop messing around."

球爸在BR週二的採訪中表示：「他們太軟了。他們不懂怎麼指導我兒子。我才知道怎麼
指導他。我（跟球哥）說就去奪勝就對了，不要再混了。」

"He's been away from me too long. I see tendencies in his game — they're
trying to baby him a little bit
column6:
said LaVar, who has drawn headlines for
refusing to thank President Donald Trump for his role in helping another
son, UCLA's LiAngelo Ball, return from China following shoplifting charges.

球爸說：「他離開我身邊太久了。我看得出他比賽的傾向----他們嘗試要呵護他。」
（本段後半在提球爸因為二球事件跟川普打口水戰的事）

What I mean by babying (Lonzo)
column7:
'He'll figure it out.' It ain't about that.
'Be patient with him?' Ain't no patience if you're winning. They're letting
it go too easy
column8:
saying they're a young team. Forget about that! Put the
(onus) on them. Say
column9:
'You guys need to win. You've got enough talent. Win
some games.'"

「至於我說『當嬰兒對待』是什麼意思，『他自己會領悟的。』跟耐不耐心無關，『對
他要有耐心？』如果一直贏球的話，還要什麼耐心。他們太容易放下（敗仗）了，藉口
說自己是年輕的隊伍，少來了吧！要給他們扛起（責任）來，要說：『你們要給我贏球。
你們天賦都很夠了。給我去贏個幾場來。』」

Asked whether he has a specific problem with head coach Luke Walton
column12:
I have a problem with losing."

當被問到對總教練華頓是否哪裡有特定的不滿時，球爸回答說：「沒有，我只對輸球
不滿。」


--
"
